article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for Replication Client
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating from GT4.0
section.para: This component is new with GT version 4.2.1; therefore, this section does not apply.

section.title: Migrating from GT3
section.para: This component is new with GT version 4.2.1; therefore, this section does not apply.

section.title: Migrating from GT2
section.para: This component is new with GT version 4.2.1; therefore, this section does not apply.
